details.publicNotes: The legs, many or few, of this shuffler are notable in that they appear to be spell casters. They eschew armor in favor of basic clothing or flowing robes that imply, but do not show, their spell-casting might.

description.value: In a droning without a specific source, the arcane shuffler launches a spell. This is an [[/r 1d5+1]]{Occult spell rank}, rolled when it attempts a spell. It knows what spell it is casting and will target it properly, though the GM determines what random spell the shuffler is attempting. If you are [[/r 1d6]]{unsure}, 1-3=offensive, 4=defensive, 5=utility, 6=buff to itself or allies. Use a spell attack of +21 and a Spell DC of 29.

Using a long cane it only has when needed, it can hook a creature within 10 feet and force it to move up to 10 feet on a successful @Check[athletics|against:reflex] check vs the Reflex DC of the character, 15 feet on a critical success. If the target space is unsafe for the creature, this gains the incapacitation trait.

By marching towards a creature it doesn't have to actually approach but does have to be within 20 feet, the Shuffler menaces with the sound of a thousand approaching feet. Make an @Check[intimidation|against:will] check against the Will DC of the enemy.

Critical Success The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Success The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Trigger A creature grabs or restrains the Shuffler.

Effect The shuffler ceases being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} and teleports to a point within 15 feet, often as a new set of legs.
